Name: Derpy Fight
About the game: Derpy Fight is a local-multiplayer game where the first player to die, wins ! Compete with your friends on focus and skilled-base fights ! Derpies are out; and they're ready to brawl for the annual tournament of Derpyland ! Pick a Derpy and jump, run, dash through your foes claim your victory and the podium !
